name: Outro
_source: # Corr, Orla, Ailsa, and Raelin are fighting
s;Orla;Damn it, kid, get out of here!{w} Go on, run!{w} Get to the others-!
# Orla is killed by an archer
s;Corridon;...{w} Shit.{w} There's too many.{w} I'm sorry girl, I...{w} I-I'm!
s;Raelin;Stay back!{w} D-don't touch me!{w} Stay the hell away from me, please!!
# Cut to black as Raelin is slain
# Quinley, Saraid, Garvey/Lamonte, Shayla, and Carlin are fighting. If recruited, Davenport is there too.
s;Carlin;We're gonna die...{w} we're gonna die!
s;Shayla;Shush, Carlin!{w} You think I don't know that? We gotta keep fighting!
s;Quinley;Oh no you don't!{w} The time for fighting's over!{w} You gotta run!
s;Carlin;We can't make it alone...{w} We...{w} we need help!
s;Quinley;Crap.{w} Crap, crap, crap, what do we do...{w} What do we do!?
s;Saraid;Go!{w} Get the kids out of here while there's still time!{w} We have to try!
s;Quinley;Me!?{w} but...{w} I can't just leave you here to die!
s;Saraid;Yes you can!{w} You will!{w} You have to!
s;Quinley;But I...{w} I don't...{w} I-I can't...
s;Lamonte;...{w} Then stay with her, Quinley.{w} I will get these two to safety.{w}{clear}On my honor, I will protect them with my very life if need be.
s;Garvey;Ah, to hell with it, I'm dead meat anyway.{w} Let me take 'em.{w}{clear}You and your friend can die in each others arms all you like.
s;Quinley;G-Garvey!?{w} It'll be dangerous!{w} You know that, don't you?
s;Garvey;'Course I do, damn it!{w}{clear}Maybe you bleeding hearts are getting to me,{w} or maybe I've just gone soft,{w} but I...{w} I only got one shot left.{w}{clear}You know what I mean?
s;Quinley;...{w} I do.{w} Go on.{w} Keep them safe!
s;Garvey;Yeah, yeah.{w} As for you lot...{w} Give 'em hell for us, will ya?
s;Quinley;Wouldn't have it any other way.
s;Osgar;Mistress Quinley...{w} I think my duty to you is coming to an end.
s;Quinley;Heh.{w} Yeah.{w} Quite the turnover rate, don't you think?
s;Osgar;...{w} Thank you for this second chance.{w} Fleeting as it was...{w}{clear}To fight for my home, one last time...{w} It was nice.
s;Quinley;Heh.{w} Nice, huh?{w} Well...{w} it was the least I could do.
s;Osgar;Mm.{w} I am proud to have served you.{w} I will face death again.{w}{clear}And this time...{w} I will do so in peace, and contentment.
s;Quinley;Saraid...{w} I know you don't like me all that much, but, well...{w}{clear}If I have to die, I'm glad I get to do it by your side.
s;Saraid;...{w} Not sure where you ever got that idea.{w} I feel the same way.
s;Quinley;That's...{w} S-Saraid...{w} I-I don't want to die...
s;Garvey;...{w} I knew it.{w} I knew we weren't gonna be so lucky.
s;Garvey;Fight?{w} Fight what?{w} Give it up, girl.{w} We've lost.{w} It's over.
s;Carlin;B-but...{w} But we were so close!
s;Lamonte;Not close enough...{w} I'm sorry, Quinley.{w} Saraid.{w} Both of you.{w}{clear}Leod.{w} The rest of town.{w} I failed everybody.{w} I'm so, so sorry...
s;Garvey;I know, kid.{w} I know.{w} Always knew I wouldn't live a long life.{w}{clear}Still...{w} to lose it so close to doing some good for once...
s;Shayla;Fine...{w} fine!{w} Then let them come!{w} Let them kill us!{w} I don't care!{w}{clear}I'm just so sick of feeling so helpless!{w} Just get it over with!!!
s;Shayla;Come on you bastards!{w} Kill me, or die trying!{w} Raaah!
# Shayla kills two, then is slain herself
# The remaining soldiers close in, killing GarvMonty
#Elspeth, Elwynn, Laisren, and Alpin are fighting. If recruited, Brassfield is here.
s;Elspeth;...{w} And that's why.{w} Take him.{w} Get him out.{w} He's just a boy...
s;Elwynn;There's no convincing you to come with us, is there?
s;Elspeth;Somebody has to cover your retreat.{w}{clear}Please, Elwynn.{w} Do this for me.{w} One final wish before the end.
s;Elwynn;...{w} Fine.{w} Come on, you two!
s;Laisren;But I can help cover the retreat!
s;Elwynn;No, lad.{w} You're the only one who stands a shot at punching through.{w}{clear}If you're not spearheading the escape, it's going to fail.
s;Laisren;It will probably fail either way!
s;Elwynn;I know that!{w} You think I don't know!?{w} We still have to try!
s;Laisren;...{w} You're right.{w} Lead the way.
s;Elspeth;Elwynn...{w} I only have one chance to say this to you in person.{w}{clear}I should've told you long ago.
s;Elspeth;...{w} I'm proud of you, Elwynn.{w}{clear}Proud of the man you've become.{w} That's all.{w} Now, go.
s;Elspeth;I told you this was suicide.
s;Brassfield;Told you I knew that already.
s;Elspeth;...{w} Is this a good death, Goddess?{w} Was this always to be my fate?
s;Elwynn;That horse of yours...{w} how fast can it ride?
s;Laisren;He's my horse.{w} If he needs to be fast enough, he will be.
s;Elwynn;Good enough for me.{w} I'm gonna clear a path.{w} Take it.{w} Don't look back.{w}{clear}Do I make myself clear?
# In a flash of light, a column of troops is slain, and Laisren rides through the gap.
# Elwynn dies before the soldiers can even reach him

s;Elwynn;Hah...{w} hah...{w} c-can't even feel my legs after that one...{w} haha...{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elwynn;HalfCloseEyes}Come on, you two.{w} Get out alive.{w}{clear}Lemme have this tiny bit of luck, just this once.{w} Just...{w} once...{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elwynn;CloseEyes}Goddess...{w} j-just...{w} one...{w} last...{w} favor...
# Ending 1: Cawthorne survived and he kills Laisren last.
s;Cawthorne;Thought I'd let you escape, eh?
s;Laisren;You!{w} Get the hell out of my way!
# Laisren charges, but is wounded after tinking
s;Alpin;Laisren!{w} Stay away from my brother!
# Alpin charges up to Cawthorne, tinking him multiple times
s;Cawthorne;Brother, eh?{w} Come now, boy.{w} Cease this tantrum.{w} It's...{w} annoying!
# The wind howls. The music is silent.
#Cawthorne taunts Laisren before preparing the final blow
s;Cawthorne;Looks like I overestimated you.{w} You were hardly any sport at all.{w}{clear}Such a shame.{w} Time to put an end to this pathetic farce.
# The following text is in narration boxes, a la chapter 1
s;Elwynn;You know,{w} this town wasn't always like this.;top
s;Elwynn;In the old days,{w} back when they darkened our doorsteps,{w}men like Taran were what barred their path.;top

s;Elwynn;It's said he gave his life to do what he did.|Did you know that?{w}{clear}The most legendary hero of all our history,{w} and he just...{w} died.{w}{clear}You know,{w} folk don't tell stories like that for nothing.;top
# Laisren charges, tinks, is wounded again, retreats a couple steps
s;Elwynn;To know that heroes are real...{w} that even a town like ours could{w} be home to such legend-makers...{w}{clear}That even in failure,{w} even wretches like ourselves could be like him.;top
s;Elwynn;Means a lot.{w} To the tired old souls like you and me...{w} it means a lot.;top
# Cut to black as Laisren is slain
# Text box appears to tell the player that eventually the good guys won; but the town never got rebuilt and the townspeople were pretty much forgotten.

s;;In the months to follow,{w} war would rage across all the land.{w} Many a village met the same fate as poor Eislinn,{w} razed to the ground all.{w} But Laisren's warning proved instrumental.{w} The early mustering of the king's forces allowed for the empire's assault to be halted.{w} Bloody though it was,{w} the empire was ultimately repelled.{w} But though the land began to heal,{w} Eislinn would never be rebuilt.{w} Indeed,{w} for many,{w} the tale of Eislinn would be but a footnote in the annals of history,{w} the town almost completely forgotten.{w} Almost.{w} Whispers abounded of a brave knight who defied the very king,{w} forsaking his duty as a knight to fulfill his duty as a brother.{w} Though his name was forgotten,{w} his deeds were not{semicolon}{w} Eislinn's name became a rallying cry for the towns and villages lost in the war.{w} So it was that their tale lived on{semicolon}{w} the tale of Eislinn,{w} the town where heroes were born.{w} So sets the sun upon the hero's village.;center;;hint;;;text
# Ending 2: Laisren killed Cawthorne with the Reclaimer!
s;Shallcross;You're an impressive one, I'll give you that much, boy.
s;Laisren;Step aside!{w} I killed your "invincible" soldier!{w}{clear}I can kill you, too!
s;Shallcross;Perhaps.{w} But your fight has left you weak.{w} Exhausted.{w}{clear}You're as good as dead.
s;Alpin;No!{w} My brother can best any one of you empire dogs!{w}{clear}Isn't that right, Laisren?
s;Laisren;N-no...{w} she's right...{w} I-I'm on my last legs, here...
# The wind howls. The music is silent.
s;Laisren;Y-you...{w} monster! H-he was just a boy!
s;Shallcross;Like I already said{semicolon}{w} a boy with a sword is a soldier.{w}{clear}It's my job to kill soldiers.{w}{clear}It's nothing personal.{w}{clear}And neither is this!
s;Shallcross;That's General Shallcross to you, vizier.{w} Don't forget your station.
s;Keeva;Of course, of course.{w} I am, as you say, a dishonorable traitor.{w}{clear}But, like this boy here, I still remain of some use to you, hm?
s;Shallcross;...{w} You wish to use HIM?
s;Keeva;Why not? You saw how he wields that spear.{w} He would do nicely.
s;Shallcross;Hmph.{w} Very well.{w} Do as you wish.
s;Laisren;What...{w} what do you want from me?
s;Keeva;...{w} You are going to die.{w} You know this by now, don't you?
s;Keeva;Yes, yes.{w} Apologies.{w} Let's cut to the chase then, shall we?{w}{clear}Your life is forfeit, but I can offer you a chance at revenge.
s;Keeva;Revenge, my good man.{w} Against the man who could've stopped all this.{w}{clear}The man whose inaction doomed you, your family, and your home.

s;Keeva;Alternatively, you could just die.{w}{clear}Then, who knows if he'll ever be brought to justice for his crimes!{w}{clear}But you...{w} you could bring him down.{w} You could avenge them.{w}{clear}Avenge this boy, your brother.
s;Laisren;You want me to work with you? With her!?{w} After she killed Alpin!?
s;Keeva;No.{w} I want you to work against your king.{w} That is all I wish.{w}{clear}You and Shallcross...{w} will simply share a common enemy, hmm?
s;Laisren;...{w} And the alternative is to just...{w} give up.{w} Is that it?{w}{clear}But we can't give up...{w} we...{w} we have to try...{w} we have to...

s;Keeva;Yes.{w} Yes!{w} Exactly!{w} If you have the chance, you must claim it!{w}{clear}I will grant you the power you need to see your will made real!{w}{clear}You shall have vengeance and more!{w} You need only claim it!{w} So...{w}{clear}What do you say?
# Timeskip to a few weeks later
# Evil kingdom has invaded the good kingdom, they're at the throneroom and all that's left is the king and a few soldiers
# Keeva kills off the mooks but leaves the king for Laisren
s;Keeva;Laisren!{w} Your prey awaits you.{w} Make good on your promise to me!
# As Laisren approaches, Elwynn narration-monologues. Between each line, he kills more soldiers
s;Elwynn;Used to be, Eilsinn was a place of warriors.{w} Heroes.{w} Legends.;top
s;Elwynn;Can you imagine, living in such a time...?{w}{clear}There ain't a soul living here today who could ever be a hero.;top
s;Elwynn;...{w} Makes me sick, really.|The people in this town these days...{w}{clear}They're rotten to the core.{w} All of Eilsinn is.{w} Rotten.{w} Diseased.;top

s;Elwynn;And that sickness never goes away.{w}{clear}It lingers, and clings, and drags us all down to the bottom with it.{w}{clear}And you know what's the worst part?{w} It's that maybe...{w} maybe...
# EVIL Laisren gives the king some speech before killing him.
s;King;You...{w} I remember you!{w} You and Keeva...{w} you're traitors, both!

s;EvilLaisren;No.{w} The only traitor I see is you.{w} You forsook my people.{w}{clear}You doomed Eislinn.{w} Left us all to die.{w} You betrayed your duty.{w}{clear}I've come to exact the punishment you deserve{semicolon}{w} death, at my hand.
s;King;Look at yourself!{w} You've lost your mind!{w} Stop this madness, please!
s;Keeva;Excellent work, Laisren.{w} Now...{w} stand aside.{w} My prize awaits.
# Keeva gets the last McGuffin stone and Bad Guy Plan succeeds.

s;Keeva;This...{w} this stone is what we were looking for.{w} At last!{w}{clear}With this, our dominion shall be as unbreakable as iron!{w}{clear}And we have you to thank for it, Laisren.{w} Bravo, really.{w} Bravo.
s;EvilLaisren;...{w} Nothing. Nothing at all.{w} What is thy will, Lord Keeva?
# Bad guys win! Tyrannical evil overlord time.

s;;With his thirst for revenge sated,{w} Laisren had doomed the land to an age of darkness and subjugation.{w} And so,{w} the sun sets on Eislinn.{w} The town with darkness in its heart,{w} a darkness so deep and so vile{w} that it infects even its noblest and gentlest hearts...;center;;hint;;;text
speak;;You've unlocked:{br}<purple>The Jukebox</>!|You can now change map and prep themes from the menu.;;;hint;;;text
speak;;You've unlocked:{br}<purple>Bonus Modes</>!|You can now select <light-orange>Weapon Reversal</>, <orange>Double Reversal</>, and <red>Reverse Recruitment</> modes.;;;hint;;;text
speak;;You've unlocked:{br}<purple>Credits</>!|You can view them in the <green>Extras</> menu.;;;hint;;;text

update_achievement;14;Flashback: Ailsa;Visit Ailsa's house with Ailsa
update_achievement;15;Flashback: Elspeth and Ailsa;Visit Ailsa's house with Elspeth

update_achievement;27;Gotoh The Bench;Clear Ch5 without deploying your Gotoh

update_achievement;30;The Darkest Timeline;Clear Ch5 after killing Cawthorne
update_achievement;32;Well, That Was Easy;Defeat Cawthorne, Keeva, and Shallcross
update_achievement;33;Not An Arena In Sight;Reach level 10 with a unit
update_achievement;34;The Same Kick, 10,000 Times;Reach Weapon Rank S with a unit
update_achievement;35;Everyone's An Edgelord;Clear the game without using any supports
update_achievement;36;The Buddy System;In a single playthrough make 4 support pairs
update_achievement;37;The Hero We Need;Support with your Gotoh
update_achievement;38;Instructions Unclear;Get generic visit dialogue for every house
update_achievement;39;All That For Nothing;Win with 0 player unit deaths
update_achievement;40;One After One, By The Star-Dogged Moon;Kill all lieutenants in their starting chapters
update_achievement;41;Do Them Dirty;Defeat all lieutenants and Cawthorne in Ch5
update_achievement;42;Vincible;Remove Divine Blessing from Cawthorne or Shallcross
update_achievement;43;A Ghastly Visitor;Visit a house with a Thrall
update_achievement;44;Hardly Trying;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (HM)
update_achievement;45;Absolutely Lunatic;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (LM)
update_achievement;46;Fully Accommodating;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (HM, RR)
update_achievement;47;Relatively Sane;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (LM, RR)
